snippet: The British government has a long-term commitment to the future of the car industry and has made that clear to Peugeot, the new owner of the Vauxhall plants, a spokesman for Prime Minister Theresa May said on Monday....

headline.main: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate
headline.print_headline: Are High Heel Dress Codes Sexist? UK Lawmakers Hold Debate

lead_paragraph: The British government has a long-term commitment to the future of the car industry and has made that clear to Peugeot, the new owner of the Vauxhall plants, a spokesman for Prime Minister Theresa May said on Monday.
